website_summaries.verdict: Has quality and features that are impressive for a mid-range price – excellent HD picture, crisp sound, and reliable smart technology by a trusted brand.
pros: An intuitive model with built-in WiFi that offers reliable connectivity
Owners love the impressive picture quality thanks to its FHD 1080p resolution, and its balanced sound that doesn't need extra speakers
cons: Lacks some of the latest apps
Many of the TV's functions are dependent on the smart remote, so losing it would be a major issue

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is VERY slow. it takes forever to connect to the internet. it needs at least 4 - 5 minutes to get connected. My other Vizio tv, which is less pricey than Samsung instantly connect to the internet even though it sits far away from the router. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time and money. Do not buy if you do not have a cable box. Try a Roku TV instead. This samsung defaults to the grainy screen (see pic) with each click of the remote. Next the remote is cramped with buttons making navigation confusing. When you get past that, netflix and amazon are the only apps that loaded (most times) without a glitch. Tech support is responsive but this tv feels less smart each time i turn it on and stare at a black screen waiting for something to load.
customer_reviews.author: Jucelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Go Samsung...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, just beautiful. I love everything about the tv. Set up was so easy and the stand didn't intimidate me, and I was putting it together myself. It doesn't wobble. The picture is really stunning. I have never owned a tv before, and I have to say that investing in Samsung (over Vizio or other smaller brands), the larger size, and 1080p were definitely worth it. I can see the quality in the image. Easy streaming and no lag. The sound is great, too. The only thing, that others have complained about too, is that the tv needs a few minutes (5 at the most) to warm up and connect to your wireless network.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around a LOT before ordering this. It arrived very well packaged and worked perfectly right out of the box. A lot of people are complaining about it being "slow" but it's a television, not a computer. It has to load everything through whatever bandwidth you have and it's 100% video content which is the largest thing you can possibly be trying to download and upload. It works just fine. When my bandwidth is sufficient there's no lag or choppiness; when I have low bandwidth it stops a lot. This is because of the bandwidth, not the television. The television is awesome. Everyone should order this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie V

customer_reviews.title: Trash tv
customer_reviews.text: The worst tv I’ve ever bought in my life. This tv has been terrible since day one. I kept waiting for it to grow on me or because it was Samsung I assumed it was a good product. This tv is impossible to get the color correct. The sound is horrible. And the “smart tv” always has a problem. I wish amazon would take this piece of trash back.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Polowy

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of this tv
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this tv, i did lots of research to see what would be the right tv for me and for the right price. I love the size of this tv, it allows me to watch with great quality. I also love the smart tv aspect of it, i am able to binge watch all of my netflix shows, and I can also downloads 'apps' like pandora and the game snake. i would highly recommend this tv for someone else
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, even for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this Samsung Smart TV. You come out so much better just buying a good quality flat screen and then purchasing an Amazon Fire TV or Fire Stick for your streaming. Samsung limits you to their app store which is minuscule compared to Amazon's. My TV also came pre-loaded with HBO Go but the app doesn't work. I contacted both HBO and Samsung and they blamed it on one another. I finally just hooked a Fire TV up to this Samsung so that I could stream anything my heart desired.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller rooms!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is so nice. The picture quality is crisp and bright. We got it for our kids bedroom, and it’s just the right size for them both to see on separate sides of the room. It’s also simple enough for them to channel through and get onto Netflix. I really appreciate how easy it is to setup and use the aspects of the Smart TV. What a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Nachelle

customer_reviews.title: I have really enjoyed this TV
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this TV. My only complaint is that recently it has begun to restart in between shows. In the time between the end of one netflix episode and the beginning of the next it will shut off and then back on and I will have to wait for it to warm up before I can turn netflix on again. I am not sure if that is an ongoing samsung problem or if my tv just doesn't like me.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin B

customer_reviews.title: Either I got a lemon or this TV is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Have to wait at least 15 minutes before accessing "smart hub" if not I get an error message saying "Preparing TV" The smart hub features are so incredibly slow. It takes a good five to ten minutes to pull up Netflix, YouTube, etc.. Now the TV has started to turn off mid stream on Netflix or YouTube, and then suddenly turn back on but to regular TV and not the smart feature I was previously on. This then restarts that 15 minute wait on the TV "preparing" and you can't access the smart hub.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Anne Watson

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and a Good TV!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good TV, with nice colors and brightness. It has all the apps that my family uses and the menu is pretty easy to navigate. The Smart Hub I know a lot of people have issues with, but I'm used to it because we have another older Samsung TV with the Smart Hub. The one thing I would change is the remote. The remote doesn't have a backlight when the buttons are pressed and the Smart Hub button is just like all the other buttons so when the room is dark it's not that easy to get the right buttons every time. Over all this is a pretty good TV and is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: All HDMI ports failed 6 months after warranty ended. ...
customer_reviews.text: All HDMI ports failed 6 months after warranty ended. That's some top notch planned obsolescence. Will never touch a Samsung product again. A TV should work without fault for a decade at least.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very slow
customer_reviews.text: This tv is really slow. I mean really slow. You have to wait at least 2 min after turning it one before you can load an app. Also all the input is slow as well. A couple of seconds after hitting the vol up button before the input is registered.
customer_reviews.author: phillip mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Believe the negative reviews......."preparing the TV"  WTF???
customer_reviews.text: Believe the bad reviews. The TV takes forever to turn on. It might as well not be a smart TV. I had to also buy a roku to stream. This is either a fake, or a dud.
customer_reviews.author: SophiaAvery

customer_reviews.title: Not So Smart Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: If you are getting this as simply a TV the setup and display runs well although it does truncate some images. If you are getting this as a web enabled TV. Look for another TV. The user interface l is not very intuitive and things are hidden. Just try loading an app. The screen keyboard and moving arrow takes a little getting used to and you may even get to a word a minute. The support pages are just as cumbersome . Very aggrevating even if you just need a simple answer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I CAN SEE CLEARLY NOW
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV, for the price it was a literal steal. Works perfectly and my mother who is very ill, is in hog heaven. I highly recommend. It was just the right side and I put it on a rolling stand ( which I purchased here at AMAZON,) so, it sits right at the bottom of her bed and rolls under the bed. It’s wonderful, and it has a mirroring feature, for plugging in your I pad, computer etc. Really a great.purchase, couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Songpeddlar

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation & Set up. Good picture and Sound Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 40" .. Since my last one stopped functioning, I needed a new tv asap.. Orderred the TV through Amazon with 1 day shipping and although I orderred it in the late afternoon, it was here 9am the next morning. Great service! The TV lightweight and easy to install. Easy to set up. Found the internet like any laptop and viola! Picture and volume are decent. The leg works although it looks flimsy but I'm not concerned since I'll be installing it on my wall anyway. Overall, for the price, I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

customer_reviews.title: Smart TV NOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I, unfortunately, bought two Samsung Smart TVs about the same time. The picture quality is ok, but the "Smart Hub" is not smart at all. You can get only a few apps and they are difficult to find. The remote to TV is extremely slow. I have just been trying to sign into a website because I cannot get the App I want and, after signing in, the picture just disappears. I have three inexpensive ROKUs and they all work just fine to access the sites you want.
customer_reviews.author: blp

customer_reviews.title: the picture quality isn't all that good no matter what setting you put it on if ...
customer_reviews.text: Eh, it's a cheap "HD" tv, the picture quality isn't all that good no matter what setting you put it on if you're watching TV or movies, but I was able to make it playable (actually, decent) on my PS4, still would recommend spending an extra 70 bucks to get a slightly better TV if you watch shows in HD or if you already have a HD TV, because you will notice the difference.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: A good practical TV that stands the test of time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in 2018 and wanted to wait at least two years before giving it a review to give y’all the scope of what to expect long term. Although the picture quality isn’t anything special, it still displays the picture as advertised and that’s something I love about the TV. The smart features are really laid out in a way that makes it easy to navigate. So much so that even my dad doesn’t have trouble finding anything. After two years, there seems to be no drop off between what was advertised and that’s the best we can ask for with TVs.
customer_reviews.author: Jevin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this TV! I cannot say enough good things about it. I will be looking to see if they sell a remote with a keyboard to type quicker on the apps, but the one it comes with works just fine. My 20 month old asks for Moo on it, so we watch cows and farm animals a lot. It's so nice being able to access different things from one remote and have them displayed on the tv rather than a computer. Smart Tvs are great, and I really love the picture on this Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Melaney M.

customer_reviews.title: Whoop there it isnt't....
customer_reviews.text: This is not the tv with the pedestal stand in the middle as advertised It has two legs are each side of the tv. This was a disappointment as it did not fit my current stand. Dealing with the 3rd party seller was a nightmare. This model is from 2015 and the performance reflects it. It was so slow I thought maybe I needed to wind it up. I finally got my refund after several delays and purchased the same brand with a larger screen but larger from another seller at for a newer tv model manufactured in 2020 with more options at a much cheaper price. I don't recommend this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Third Time's the Charm
customer_reviews.text: It took 3 tries before I received a tv that hadn't been broken in delivery, but once I did get one it was very nice. The stand was easy to set up, and the smart tv setup was pretty simple. I have a wired connection between it and my router, and aside from some skipping in Netflix at first (when I assume it was updating firmware) it has worked great. The picture quality is what you would expect from a name-brand TV.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, if you can shut off the CE Dimming feature
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it connected to the DP (display port connection) of my HP desktop because of the annoying Samsung CE Dimming (auto dimming feature) that manifests itself in all picture modes except Movie and PC mode. Then I learned I could eliminate the auto dimming by using this DP to hdmi adapter:  So, make sure you can find a way to get around the CE Dimming (which drastically darkens images that are already predominately dark or that have few objects on screen) or you may find this tv to be almost unwatchable.
customer_reviews.author: ILHTM

customer_reviews.title: What Samsung DOESN'T tell you with the mobile phone mirroring option
customer_reviews.text: It's rather disappointing for the fact that the product description states it has the capability to "Mirror" your mobile phone. I own an iPhone (as well as nearly 46% of the entire population owning smartphones), and this TV is not capable of mirroring iPhones. The product description did not advise of this, and it's frustrating. The whole point I went with the more expensive "SMART TV" was to have the mirror capability. Otherwise, I would've gone with the $50 less expensive, non SMART TV model, and purchased an Apple TV for $40-$60. Otherwise, the TV has impressive sound (though it's lacking bass), and nice picture.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great TV at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful TV! I am very pleased with Samsung. I recently had a Visio TV that died, no more Visio TV's for me! My SamsungTV has amazing color and picture. It has great sound quality and volume. I like the low energy use, I think that it is so important, I love all of the features. But as yet I haven't set it up with my laptop that is on the agenda today. I have only had it for a few days, and so far no problems with anything. I will update in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Do homework & make informed Smart TV decision
customer_reviews.text: Great picture! But "smart hub" menu drives me crazy. It takes a while to load. Why should I have to wait for a tv to "prepare" itself in 2016? This tv has issues with wifi in the same room my Kindle, Dragon tablet and smart phone pick up wifi fine. Very frustrating when it loses wifi connection. Sometimes it loses sound for no reason (could be a Netflix issue but it's never happened on my Kindle). I hope all smart tvs don't have these issues. I bought this tv because of Samsung name, very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 'Smart' part of the TV is useless!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars, since maybe the 'actual functionality' of the TV is good. Its been 24 hours since I've had this TV, and I've already spent more than an hour with samsung customer service for issues. The 'Smart Hub' is very problematic. My YouTube kept crashing, and the rep blamed it on my internet connection. I have 50 mbps (shared by TV and a single laptop). I didnt see the problem, but I still went ahead and upgraded to 100 Mbps. The app has frozen on me more than 20 times in just 24 hours. My software is upto date, no other obvious problems. Will probably return it, if it gives more issues within the next 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Great for using as a large PC Gaming Monitor. Would have given it 5 stars, but I have a couple of (not dead and not stuck) screwed up pixels right in the middle of the screen, and the lower left corner is dark like the screen is pushed into the filament. Sometimes the pixels in the middle work, but usually they don't. Like right now, the background of this page is white, but one pixel is green. Wouldn't even notice if using as a tv from a distance, but as a gaming monitor right in my face, it kinda stands out. But I would still recommend this tv to others.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky T.

customer_reviews.title: Bad tv.
customer_reviews.text: Remote control really stinks. The layout is very bad. Things are not where it would be easily accessible. Sound is horrible and reverberates inside the tv. There is a long lag when pushing buttons on remote and them actually doing something. Sometimes the remote doesnt work at all. Color, expecially black, is off and makes the picture seem smeared on the screen. Even adjustments to the color, tint, contrast, did not help. Very dissapointed in the tv.
customer_reviews.author: STop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price, slow
customer_reviews.text: The picture comes in great, the sound is fine, but it is so SLOW. I love that it is a Smart TV and has apps for YouTube, AmazonVideo, etc but half the time I try watching a video they stop to load and never start playing again. It takes a full minute after the TV is turned on for you to be able to even open the apps up. This is very frustrating for someone who doesn't have cable channel access and likes watching videos online, or if you are trying to entertain guests and the video or movie wont play. For the price, it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Defective casing around tv
customer_reviews.text: White line across picture at top of the screen, plastic housing is warped, just got it all set up to now have to take it all down and return it, what a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Colls

customer_reviews.title: I don't have any problems with the picture quality but ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any problems with the picture quality but I do with some of the apps. When ever I try to watch youtube videos, the sound drops out after a few minutes and then it comes and goes. Sometimes it get way out of synch with the video. This also happens on my TWC app when I watch tv on the app. My fix is to use screen mirring and us my tablet to mirror on the tv. I have tried all of the updates and changing my DNS ip to 8.8.8.8 but still no fix.
customer_reviews.author: BPrat

customer_reviews.title: We bought this TV because we really like the other Samsung we got couple years ago
customer_reviews.text: We bought this TV because we really like the other Samsung we got couple years ago. Image/picture is very lively, sound is not the best but it does the trick for us. If you like it loud, you may want to consider buying a sound bar or alike. The smart part of it is OK, I'm not sure if I got too used with my way around the ROKU box, but it feels slow at times ~ this is the only reason why I'm not giving 5 stars. Overall, we are pretty satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samira Tannure

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Crisp clear picture and easy to program. Not at all flimsy. I put it together myself with absolutely no problems. My house is 115 years old with slanted floors and my Samsung TV is standing solid and secure on the stand I have for it. Super happy with the smart functions and how well it displays the local channels. I use an antenna with it and my Samsung tablet that mirrors so I'm free of cable and the huge monthly bills! Thanks, Samsung! You saved me $120 a month!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Smart tv. The resolution is great, setup was easy and it works great with our wifi. Remote is a little slow and smart tv functions take a few minutes to load when your turn system on. Those are nitpicky flaws. Tv is light, looks great and it is easy to stream from Internet, Amazon or Netflix. This was a lightning deal which made it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: The Samsung smart tv has good pic quality and it was easy ...
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung smart tv has good pic quality and it was easy to set up. The only problem I have is that Hulu doesn't work well with smart tv's. The shows on Hulu are constantly buffering and I my internet Upload speed is 62.46 Mps. I have contacted Hulu, but the rep seems like this was the first time he heard of this problem. I explained to him that the reviews are all over the internet. Since, I can't watch Hulu without the buffering, I just use my amazon fire tv until Hulu fixes their buffering problem. UPDATE as of APRIL 7: HULU is now working good on the Samsung tv, which is why I change my stars to 5.
customer_reviews.author: luv dem boots

customer_reviews.title: I will say for the price this is quite nice. Meets and exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous picture and frankly do not mind the speakers that come with the TV...you should keep in mind I am trading up from a TV that still had a tube. :D I will say for the price this is quite nice. Meets and exceeds my expectations. Nice view from really just about any angle. Netflix and Amazon stream flawlessly and the Smart Hub Menu is very easy to maneuver. I will be getting a sound bar for it, might as well live large.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Fair but not good
customer_reviews.text: Not up to the normal Samsung quality. Extremely slow to "boot up" and thought there was something wrong with it but discovered it to be normal and lots of complaints about it. Nice picture but not pleased with the amount of time it takes to start up.
customer_reviews.author: Arkansas Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Uselees for hearing impaired.
customer_reviews.text: Good picture but totally useless for those of us who are hearing impaired and need both speaker and headphone (audio output) available at the same time. I'll not consider Samsung products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: this is the greatest deal I have ever had the pleasure to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the greatest deal I have ever had the pleasure to purchase -no problem by far the best tv every thing is perfect .I dig everything about the Samsung un40j5200 40 inch 1080p smart lrd tv,and the shipping service every thing related to this purchase was perfect. I plan to purchase another one for my sister as soon as possible this is why I am an will remain a fan of amazon,thank all of you at amazon. gus perez
customer_reviews.author: gustavo perez

customer_reviews.title: Samsung TV'S Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I have the 48 inch and it is an excellent TV as I expected. I have 3 other Samsung TV'S and all are great products. Some of the other reviews are stating TV is slow, I have not had that problem at all. TV is quite fast and has a beautiful picture. The smart features work outstanding. Love the new Samsung Smart Hub, it is more user friendly than before. Get em while there on sale. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tjackson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and will have to wait another two weeks for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting for the TV for weeks. It finally arrived and item is defective. It repeatedly turns on and off. Called customer service and told there's nothing they can do and to have it replaced. I looked online and it's a common problem. Had I known, I would have NEVER bought from Samsung. Very disappointed and will have to wait another two weeks for the replacement and hope that it's not defective out of the box again. If it is, I will simply request a refund and spend my money elsewhere. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Argos

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a Very Smart Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son and he LOVES it. He was looking up all the apps on his phone and now can do it on his Smart TV in the privacy of his bedroom!! This was a great price for a great value. Highly recommend. Super fast shipping and FedEx took care to make sure it was not damaged and delivered with care. :D
customer_reviews.author: Farmerz Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase honestly so much I bought myself a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this purchase honestly so much I bought myself a 32 inch for myself since this was my mom's birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: The TV is great, but the smart hub is slow and stops ...
customer_reviews.text: The TV is great, but the smart hub is slow and stops working after a few shows. I've been using it for HBOgo and it won't let me return to previous screen. I can't shut it off to restart it. I've manually shut it off. The YouTube app wouldn't connect. The TV says it wasn't connected to the internet, yet when I went into the network status it said it was.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E. Repko

customer_reviews.title: Great...... for 26 days.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 26 days and now it will not turn on. The red light is on but nothing happens when I press the button on the remote or television. I've been in contact with "Good As New Electronics" and so far they have been generous with a pre-paid shipping label and are working with me but we'll see how it goes when I get it back.
customer_reviews.author: Evo

customer_reviews.title: it's a Smart TV and the red is not so good
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, it's a Smart TV and the red is not so good. I was better off getting a Vizio. You have to go into settings to fix the color on the tv. Which annoys me, because I've had many TV's and never had to do that. So I'm still working on getting the color correct. It's either too blue, green and not enough red, the red is like burgundy or pink. Deepening on what you're watching.
customer_reviews.author: Kindell Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Good budget tv
customer_reviews.text: This tv is light weight, no frills and the smart hub functions enable me to watch Netflix without any additional over the top boxes. Con is the image quality is not amazing - for a HDTV the image is not particularly sharp
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Way above expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Now don't let the price fool you I did not expect this TV to be as amazing and high quality as it is. Not only did this TV only weighs 22 pounds so one person could move it around. It also was unbelievably easy for setup just pull in and go, I have Roku setup to it as well as cable TV both work great on the frist try. The picture quality was great it is very clear with great depth of color and not dark. Came in great very large box filled with peanuts so it shipped completely safe and needed to be signed for. Would but again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Meyer

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this TV yesterday. Extremely easy to set up. I was amazed that it is so much lighter in weight than the Toshiba led purchased just two years ago. We didn't like that the brightness automatically dims, but it was very easy to turn off in the systems setting (eco sensor). The price is good, half what the Toshiba was. So far this is a great TV and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Needs the Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! I have never owned a Smart TV and this is GREAT !!! When the box got here I groaned at first, thinking it was going to be heavy but, it wasn't. It weighed alot less than the corner stand I bought to set it on. The only thing I noticed is the sound, I have to turn the volume way up so that I get good sound. Now I know why they show you the sound bar to purchase when you purchase the TV....lol. Eventually I will order the sound bar too. Great TV, good picture, great features, I would definately recommend this product to anyone. And the price was unbeatable !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from "the open box" link. There was a disclaimer that stated it might has scratches but the tv was in perfect condition. It was delivered to my door and the driver waited for someone to answer instead of leaving it on the porch and running to the next stop. I'm not sure what they would have done if I wasn't home. Tv works well, has an excellent picture and is easy to program. But, I was still using an analog tv with a converter, so what do I know???!!! Any tv would be an upgrade. The price was reasonable compared to others I looked at. I'm happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to surprise my fiancée for Christmas. I'm pretty sure he teared up a little. The picture is great, and I like the backlight options. We stream a lot of our entertainment and it does everything that we need it to do. The program guide for over the air digital is very nice compared to what I've had before.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Pickering

customer_reviews.title: It's not very smart
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call it a Smart TV. The "Smart TV" part is difficult to program and navigate. Also, the number of channels is limited, unlike a Roku. Unfortunately, it doesn't have enough HDMI ports to connect my external Roku so I had to use the AV port. I lose the HD but, at least, I can easily watch Netflix, Amazon, etc. With ease. The picture is good and I have it hooked up to my home theater so the sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Faye Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap- won't last long
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, went out 3 months after the warranty expired, so it was a real good tv for 1 year 3 months I guess. Tried replacing the main board as well, but that didn't help so we just ended up getting a different tv. If you research it most people will either have a great one working for many years, or it will literally go out within a couple months after warranty expiration, so maybe they just build a certain amount of defective units, who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works except the smart apps take forever usually about 5 spaced out clicks ...
customer_reviews.text: It works except the smart apps take forever usually about 5 spaced out clicks to get to the apps then another 12-15 spaced out clicks sometimes more to choose any app. I would not purchase this tv again I should have taken the negative reviews seriously. Putting netflix or youtube on is such a long process it's a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: chris reed

customer_reviews.title: 40" led smart tv
customer_reviews.text: Great fast service. A replacement for an older flat screen. Sure didn't look like a 40" once out of the box. It is so light weight & had my doubts about the stand . It actually sits well on top of the old vcr and fits the space perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kitty queen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. TV for guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. It is used in a guest room and the quality is wonderful. We have an external antenna connected to it (no cable) and it's perfect for our guest bedroom. We bought this during Amazon Prime Week and it was a steal. Samsung is reliable and sturdy. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NST3

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Great picture and clarity. This TV was just what we needed. It also fit our universal wall mount, so we didn't have to more holes in the wall. Basic remote. Great apps. Needs a sound bar for great sound, so we got that seperately. Sound doesn't go as loud as it should for such a large TV.
customer_reviews.author: awesomelife1980

customer_reviews.title: Smart TV truly smart
customer_reviews.text: We purchase this TV for our living room. We mainly use it for our small group times when we show a DVD lesson to discuss. This works very well for this. The TV is so smart it knows when a DVD is put in and automatically goes to this function! Fun.
customer_reviews.author: Judy from NC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV with great display quality and especially for price versus performance it is an excellent TV that can easily last year's with the connections it has and how it performs.
customer_reviews.author: TrapStr

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV and has everything you needs :D :D
customer_reviews.text: The TV has everything anyone needs. It has two HDMI inputs. I can connect my headphone directly to the TV using audio output. Also, It has optical audio output. I can play videos from my external hard drive by connecting it using USB port. The size is nice for my area. The quality of picture is perfect. Besides, it is smart TV. You can browse internet or watch Netflix directly from the TV. In addition, I can connect my TV to the internet wired using Ethernet port. It am fully satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The skin color is so pinky and others stations just fine. Netflix app dose not run as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: One problem is the color variation between station when they run the news. The skin color is so pinky and others stations just fine. Netflix app dose not run as well as it dose on my sony blue ray player . Netflix get jerky at times when I watch a movie. I never have that on my sony blueray. It was a great price and for sports the picture is awesome. But the sony tv I was comparing it to I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Koller

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice, solid TV!
customer_reviews.text: This TV fits what we needed: good picture, good sound, good look, and good price. We don't need the most extravagant TV on the market, just one that met our needs. We had a TV where the sound wasn't working very well, and it's nice to have back that nice clear sound that can fill up the room. The picture is very nice, no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: tjp1684

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Picture
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value. The picture quality is very good, almost as good as a plasma TV. Like most new flat-screen TV's, it's very light and easy to mount on the wall. The sound quality is not great but good enough for most TV programs. Voice quality is very good, but music is just OK.
customer_reviews.author: JimBo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I got this TV on their cyber monday promo. This is exactly was i've been looking for for quite some time. I've never owned a TV because I watch everything on my PC. If you're looking for an in depth review about features this isn't one. Its size is perfect, apps are all i need (youtube, netflix, hulu), and i'm able to sync my galaxy tab to it and mirror my games and browsing. THE ONLY drawback is that i can't mirror my iPhone. This doesn't surprise me since i'm aware of the marketplace rivalries but it was still disappointing none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tv! I love that it's a smart tv
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tv! I love that it's a smart tv, and the size is great, it's not too small and even looks like a 50 inch. I would definitely recommend. It was an easy set up, and was able to connect to the wifi. I watch movies and tv shows on Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, youtube videos, HBO go, and other apps. I would definitely recommend. The tv is super light to carry as well so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Roxey P

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my new apartment, and it fits perfectly! Samsung always has great quality. The only thing needs to be improved is the remote - it doesn't seems to be sensitive, and I have to push really hard to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t tried contacting Samsung yet but 10 months seems like a very short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother in law less than 1 year ago and now the picture no longer works. I haven’t tried contacting Samsung yet but 10 months seems like a very short lifespan. It had a very nice picture! But now no picture😳
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is okay for the dough
customer_reviews.text: its pretty decent for the money. seems to work fast & connects to all the smart apps well. it does have a funny burning smell all the time its turned on. smells like a capacitor is heating up and is about to pop - I keep thinking its going to burn out everyday when I turn it on. still works though. I hope it doesn't burn out because I have no idea where to send it if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? However, ahem As I subscribe to direct TV nowj (recently cut my cable cord) They are not compatible with Samsung televisions But I'm hoping they will work it out
customer_reviews.author: Can I be honest?

customer_reviews.title: Tv defected
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased, tv has been on the wall for 3 days and picture is very dark . When I turn tv off and turn back on it clears up only for 10 mins .. So disappointed, I threw the box away .. will be calling customer service in the am ..
customer_reviews.author: beme

customer_reviews.title: Don't get sucked into the nay sayers.
customer_reviews.text: Despite numerous people complaining about this TV I found it to be easy to setup, sounds good (has numerous different sound profiles), allowed access to Netflix in under 10 seconds via WiFi and it looks great. There are several profiles for things like gaming, sports, etc. This is a good TV for what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Feineis

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good tv with good picture. Lost a star because we couldn't get tv and sound bar to sync together so we could control sound from one remote like I did in the living room set. Lost another star due to start up being slow. At start up we have to wait 3-5 minutes to use the apps, but this being the bedroom set it's just a nuisance that we'll live with.
customer_reviews.author: Draytrek

customer_reviews.title: Terrible "Smart" TV
customer_reviews.text: First day purchased it would not play Netflix, as it kept continually reloading the movie after 2 seconds of playing. The internet connection is strong and fast, it is the TV shortcoming. Only way to exit Netflix is to unplug the TV. If you exit Netflix using the exit tab, then it freezes up. After Netflix the TV will not turn off, so have to unplug it. Terrible "Smart" TV. The other brands in the house work great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but wonder
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was amazing at first but after a week not as clear. So far same quality for next 3 weeks. I give it a 3 just because i expect the picture to fade again soon but this is my opinion, hope i'm wrong! Other than this everything works great and am happy for now.
customer_reviews.author: dare

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is amazingly clear and fast to connect to the internet. I am so impressed with Samsung as this is my first Samsung TV. It was very easy to set up using the instructions provided. I can go right online and use many apps on the TV.
customer_reviews.author: C. Galvin

customer_reviews.title: Love the TV
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV! I haven't had any problems with this TV. I recommended this TV to my Mother and she loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: ... and it absolutely does its job and I am pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Got it on Sale - last year's model and it absolutely does its job and I am pleased with it. I do not watch a lot of tv or browse the web with it, so I have no comments in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: After two years the WiFi no longer works which makes a smart TV pretty useless. It's no longer under warranty so Samsung won't fix it except for a pretty penny. They also refuse to acknowledge that this is a problem with a huge amount of their TVs. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great tv nice size
customer_reviews.text: I love my tv I wall mounted it in my bedroom with a cheata mount I mirror image tv with my note 3 X X X it is not compatible with THE HBO NOW App. (Game of thrones) SO I have to mirror image that Netflix, hulu, & prime video.5 stars on that part but overall cause a few app are nogo
customer_reviews.author: bob prows

customer_reviews.title: Great picture.  Great price
customer_reviews.text: Samsung has never disappointed me. I didn't even shop any other brands. I just went for Samsung and it has a great picture with lots of nice options. Smart TV is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Regular.

customer_reviews.title: When I turn on the TV and try to access the smart app options
customer_reviews.text: It has one weird problem. When I turn on the TV and try to access the smart app options, it tells me that it is still loading and to try again later. It takes several minutes before I can use the smart apps.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Espejo

customer_reviews.title: Clear & Crisp
customer_reviews.text: The graphics on this TV are amazing. Going from our old TV to the Samsung is like suddenly seeing color for the first time. Everything is crisp and clear. It's definitely worth the money and the best TV I've ever owned. We only have antenna (no satellite HD channels here) and every show comes in so clear; it's like watching a blu-ray for 90% of the channels. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a new TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love It, great price, great picture. Smart TV options are a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: roxanne ciccone

customer_reviews.title: Samsung doesn't stand by warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Seven months and the TV has died. Slowly started pixilation and freezing. Now just a white screen and vertical colorful lines. I did purchase the Square Trade protection plan which is useless. They stated manufacturer problem. Contacted Samsung and they are not standing by the warranty. First and last Samsung product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product is satisfactory for my family's purposes. The set up is easy my only complaint is that there is a lag time with the processor example meeting switching from different applications to different applications require a little patience in addition every time you turn on the television you cannot immediately go to an application as it requires a "prep time" for the TV to start functioning. For the price it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. Great picture and overall excellent in the smart department. I read some mixed reviews on this TV. One person said it was slow to turn off and on? Its about normal and LCD TV's run florescent lamps behind the screen.
customer_reviews.author: William G Archambault

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This TV arrived in record time. I must admit... if I'd researched or waited two days I could have gotten it for less w/ all the holiday sales. But... It was easy to put together. I measured the "foot" and made a table top for my small table so that it would stand safely. It's so light there is no problem with it on the smaller table. If I can set this up... anyone can.
customer_reviews.author: RANDON T. Enterprize

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Measurements - TV is wider than listed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this TV... and I would have, if the measurements would have been listed accurately. The width was listed as 42.3", however, it was exactly 43", thus not fitting in our space. Shame on Samsung for not giving accurate dimensions. Now we have to return it -- an unnecessary hassle that could have easily been avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who complains about this TV most likely has something else wrong with their system (unless the TV arrives damaged). Yes, it takes a minute or two after turning on for your internet to connect to the TV so you can use the smart features. Be patient. The signal is coming from outter space. If your cable box is running slow, chances are it's not the TV. Light weight and great for easy hanging on a wall. I highly recommend the Cheetah Mounts for this TV as it sits within 3 inches of the wall. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Good 40-inch LED TV for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good 40-inch LED TV for the money. Screen resolution and sharpness is good. Everything works. No problems. I like using smart TV feature, to view YouTube and Amazon video. Smart TV does not require additional devices like PC or console for streaming video. Only one complain is that smart TV feature takes long time to start.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is great. The only problem I have had is with ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is great. The only problem I have had is with the apps. The YouTube app fails to play sound very often and cuts out after a bit. I ended up plugging in my Chromcast. The Netflix app works fine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy this TV, but we watched one Star Trek episode and knew the sound was wrong. We had to have it almost full blast to be able to hear the characters talk. The same thing has happened each time we have tried to watch something on it. We are sadly returning it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Antares

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product great price.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful TV is refurbished can't tell by the way it looks or performs. Beautiful picture WiFi is just what I needed. Bought Samsung blue ray player to go along with Roku 3. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Keith L.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to friends & family
customer_reviews.text: The tv is wonderful, picture is excellent and the sound quality is primo. The shipping that Amazon was delayed slightly and someone had to be at the address for delivery. At delivery the shipping company inspects the television to see that it is functional and good to go! I'm glad it arrived all in one piece. The one downfall is that upon start up, the apps for the tv have a time that the tv is "preparing", my s.o. thought it would be better without the "delay". So impatient 😂. Still overall the t.v. had become a great addition to our family and is great for our living area!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: Tv came quick, setup was a breeze, and the picture on full HD is great. Only complaint, and it's nothing really, is the sleep timer is hidden in a few menu's instead of a button on the remote. Full disclosure I don't use the "smart" aspect as I have no need for it. I have a PS3 hooked up and I use that for all streaming, so I don't plan on using the tv for that although I did connect it to the router, which was simple. The ads one poster complained about can be simply turned off, but it comes defaulted on
customer_reviews.author: Derek W

customer_reviews.title: Came one day early which was great as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Came one day early which was great as a gift. No issues, samsung is the best TV. Less complicated that sony and the same quality picture. The price was really no better than a deal at walmart or best buy but since I was sending as a gift it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Samsung suprisingly low quality
customer_reviews.text: Severe out of box failure. This is an obvious manufacturing DEFECT that should have never made it out of the factory. The backlighting on the left side of the screen was showing through between the case and the screen. Seemed assembled correctly with no damage visible, but you could clearly see the bright backlight through the screen for about 18" along the left side. TV functioned normally otherwise. There must be no quality inspection of any kind or this would never have made it out of the factory. I have been a loyal Samsung TV purchaser for over 7 years (own 3 this was 4th), but looks like it might be time to look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

product_meta.title: Samsung UN40J5200 40-Inch 1080p Smart LED TV (2015 Model)
product_meta.description:
Size:40-Inch| Style:TVEnjoy a viewing experience that is 2X the clarity of standard HD TVs. Enjoy a clear moving picture resolution at Motion Rate 60 with amazing refresh rate, processing speed and backlight technology. See every image as the director intended with enriched colors – even with older, non-HD content.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Smart Functionality: Yes- Built in Wi-Fi
Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 36.3" x 20.6" x 2.3", TV with stand: 36.3" x 23.2" x 11.3"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,764 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
